BotSnake - a Snake-like controllable thread class.

Class defining the StartPanel which is displayed after game ends, can relaunch the game.

unused
MainGame
Class handling the game state logic, creates all threads, displays the start and end panels.

Class responsible for creating, reading and writing to the score file.

StartPanel
Class defining the StartPanel which is displayed on first launch of the game.
